body_html:
I then checked my path /usr/lib64/. Nolibstdc++.so.6.
But I can find it in my anaconda, so I added this sentence in my .basrhc to avoid conflicting with my caffe and tensorflow.
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/export/home/dyh/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
It works.
Thanks for help.
body_text:
I then checked my path /usr/lib64/. Nolibstdc++.so.6.
But I can find it in my anaconda, so I added this sentence in my .basrhc to avoid conflicting with my caffe and tensorflow.
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/export/home/dyh/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

Thanks for help.
body:
I then checked my path ```/usr/lib64/```. No```libstdc++.so.6```.
But I can find it in my anaconda, so I added this sentence in my ```.basrhc``` to avoid conflicting with my caffe and tensorflow.
```export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/export/home/dyh/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH```
It works.
Thanks for help.
